text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Kaala Bhairavar puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: Pannisai, Adi Streets, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 a.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Discourse on ‘Bhagavan Sri Ramakrishnar’ by Nirmalachaitanya, 5.45 p.m.; aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Divine Life Society: Satsangh and bhajan; discourse on ‘Tirukkural’ by Kishore; Swami Sivananda Sundarananda presides, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Discourse on ‘Lalithasahasranamam’ and spiritual heritage class by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 10 a.m.; on ‘Mundakopanishad,’ 7 a.m.; ‘Bhaja Govindanm,’ Vasudhara, Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust: Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Discourse on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life Divine’ by Subramany, Nithyatha, Auro Lab, Veerapanjan, 10 a.m.

Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Discourse on ‘Mandookya Upanishad’ by Swami Samananda, Swami Tatwananda Ashram, P and T Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Sunday Vespers Service: J.B. Jeyaraj preaches, S. Wellington leads, Jubilee Chapel, American College, 6 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service; M. Kumarasamy delivers message, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Arulgnana Sabai: Discourse on ‘Kambanil Thedungal Teadadadum Kidaikkum’ by Vala. Palaniappan, Thiagarajar College of Engineering, 6.30 p.m.

Rajarajeswari Aanmeega Ilakkiya Mandram: Talk on ‘Sanga Tamizh Maalai’ by M. Srinivasan, Manicka Mandapam, 116 South Avanimoola Street, 6.35 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Frer rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Tamil Isai Sangam: 41{+s}{+t}annual Tamil music festival; vocal concert by Maharajapuram M. S. Ganesh Viswanathan, 5.15 p.m.; ‘Kandapuranam,’ dance drama by Charanya Nrutya Vidyalaya, Raja Muthiah Mandram, 6.45 p.m.

GENERAL

CSI Arts and Science College for Women: M. Jessie Pauline Jeya Priya, Principal, inaugurates NSS camp; M. Joseph, correspondent, presides, Chettikulam, 2 p.m.

M.S. Chellamuthu Institute of Mental Health and Rehabilitation: Programme on “Positive discipline,” G. Gurubharathy speaks, Ahana Hospitals, 7 Subbaraman Street, Gandhi Nagar, 10 a.m.

Sri Aurobindo Mira Group of Educational Institutions: Madhan Karky inaugurates SAM Utsav 2016, cultural show; M. Rajarajan, Deputy Commissioner of Police, addresses, Sri Aurobindo Mira Matriculation Higher Secondary School, 4 p.m.

Maram Madurai: Madurai Youth Day celebration, Gandhi Museum, 9 a.m.

Vaa Nanbaa: Beautification of roundabouts, New Natham Road, 7.30 a.m.

Subitcham: Meeting on providing care for mentally ill people at home, Sakthi Press, Ramaiah Street, Shenoy Nagar, 11 a.m.

Yadavar Panpattu Kazhagam: Executive committee meeting, 120 Feet Road, Min Nagar, 5 p.m.

Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association: 30{+t}{+h}All India Ideal Home Exhibition, 11 a.m.; Sellur K. Raju, Minister for Cooperation, delivers valedictory address; V. V. Rajan Chellappa, Mayor, and Sandeep Nanduri, Corporation Commissioner, address; L. Murari presides, Tamukkam ground, 4 p.m.

Sivananda Tapovanam: C. Thamaraikannan, Senior General Manager, Jeevan Nissan, inaugurates Sivananda free medical camp; A. Sundaresan, Senior Manager, Uco Bank, presides, Sivananda Nagar, Thoppur, 11 a.m.

Asian Badminton Club: Free eye camp, Tamil Nadu Housing Board Colony, Mela Anuppanadi, 9 a.m.

Veerasamy Yogeeswarar Trust: C. Jayaraman, panchayat president, Podumbu, inaugurates free Siddha hospital, Pasingapuram, 8 a.m.

Aishwaryam Trust: Vijayendra Bidari, Superintendent of Police, inaugurates Nethravathi Pain, Palliative Care and Rehabilitation Centre, Anbu Nagar, Kadachanendal, 9.30 a.m.

Viswa Hindu Parishad: Meeting to condole the demise of Chinmaya R. Somasundaram; Vedantam presides, Pattu Mahal, S. S. Colony, 10 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting; UC Higher Secondary School, 11 a.m.; RC School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall, Lake View Road, K. K. Nagar, and Railway Institute, 7 p.m.
title: madurai today
